name: edrys-lite
description: Browser based edrys-clone that uses the WebTorrent network sharing labs

scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf dist && npm run build:edrys && npx parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --log-level verbose --public-url ./
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && npm run build:edrys && npx parcel serve src/*.html --no-cache --no-source-maps --open --port 6999
scripts.minify:js: find dist -name "*.js" -print0 | xargs -0 -P 4 -I {} sh -c 'before=$(wc -c < {}); minify {} > {}.min && after=$(wc -c < {}.min); if [ ${after} -lt ${before} ]; then mv {}.min {}; reduction=$((${before}-${after})); percent=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.2f\", ${reduction}/${before}*100}"); echo "{} reduced from ${before} to ${after} bytes (${percent}% reduction)"; else rm {}.min; echo "{} no reduction achieved, file size unchanged"; fi'
scripts.build:edrys: npx parcel build src/api/edrys.ts --no-scope-hoist --no-source-maps && mv dist/edrys.* dist/module/
scripts.analyze: rm -rf dist && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer src/index.html && firefox parcel-bundle-reports/default.html
